unnormalised: Tumkam khobor asa ki 15°C-ak sumar 737 gram petrolacho ek liter asta? Hem vozon thoddem ushnatek ani mellounk ghaltelea vostunche voilean bodlu yeta.
normalised: Tumkam khobor asa ki pandhra digri selsiyasak ek litrache petrol sumar saatxim teentis gram asta? Hem vozon temperatura ani mix kel'lea vostuncher thoddem bodol zata.
text: Tumkam khobor asa ki 15°C-ak sumar 737 gram petrolacho ek liter asta? Hem vozon thoddem ushnatek ani mellounk ghaltelea vostunche voilean bodlu yeta.
